sbp.client.loggers.udp_logger module¶

class sbp.client.loggers.udp_logger.UdpLogger(address, port)[source]¶

Bases: sbp.client.loggers.base_logger.BaseLogger

The UdpLogger logs SBP messages over UDP.

: string
IP Address to send UDP packets to.

: int
IP Port to send UDP packets to.
